text: <@U01TBAF98H0> - That makes sense given how few of them there are vs the total market. The inverse would be that we’ve both seen a ton of WordPress websites with small amounts of organic traffic. My recommendations would be a custom headless CMS > WordPress > Wix.

elements.text: - That makes sense given how few of them there are vs the total market. The inverse would be that we’ve both seen a ton of WordPress websites with small amounts of organic traffic. My recommendations would be a custom headless CMS > WordPress > Wix.

text:
Hey everyone!
Not sure if this is the best channel, but sharing it here as it seems the most appropriate

I'm looking for an excellent reco for a featured image plugin for Wordpress. In the past, we had featured images for all our category pages but had to get rid of the plugin as it was causing a lot of issues and slowing the blog.

I want to have manual control over feature image to promote posts that need visibility without breaking the entire blog.
Anyone?

elements.text:
Hey everyone!
Not sure if this is the best channel, but sharing it here as it seems the most appropriate

I'm looking for an excellent reco for a featured image plugin for Wordpress. In the past, we had featured images for all our category pages but had to get rid of the plugin as it was causing a lot of issues and slowing the blog.

text:
That's sound logic. Can't refute it. 

In your experience, have you seen any wix sites doing well? Like, even one? 

I know there's loads more WordPress than wix and to compare the two isn't fair. I just wouldn't feel comfortable being a pioneer in the wix space. Would want someone else to prove it's at least possible first.
